value:
You share the form of the beasts, but
you may in fact be similar to us. Or,
perhaps... Hmm.

This castle reminds me of Garreg
Mach... Can you sense it? A power
unsuited to this place roils here...$k$pOne wonders what might just happen
one day...

My experiments at the village went
well. It's all coming together... We
will see our dreams realized.

Whether the beasts quarrel, fight, die,
or even live... We care not.

With an offering prepared, all can
be set in motion... But it seems
best I simply observe for now.

So, you are $Nu...
An ominous star shines on you.
Like $Nf...
My name is Solon, the savior of all!

If you prefer it so, you shall also be
added to the ranks of the dead!

A pity. Now that I have what I came
for, I must bid you farewell.

I know not what you have in mind,
and I care little, but very well. It is
but a trifle.

I am Solon. My research has been
tireless...and I draw ever closer to
saving the world from those beasts!

Fascinating. Truly fascinating. I
must offer you my thanks. An
opportunity like this is rare.$k$pThe Forbidden Spell of Zahras
forms a darkness that consumes
all, and yet...$k$pWhat you wield could be considered
its antithesis. It steals a sliver of light
from the ocean of chaos.$k$pThe Askran monument and that light
must be twined in a formula...$k$pBut I presume you do not yet
understand it yourself.$k$pUnderstanding may come, however,
if we join forces... Worry not. Time is
of no concern. Not for us...
はあっ
ふんっ
ぐっ
ぬおおっ
Die.
Beasts! All of you!
This is the end.
Beg for mercy.
Failure...
Heh heh heh...
My name is Solon. I am the true savior of all.
What is this foolishness? I have no time to waste on the likes of you...
I was hiding away in Garreg Mach to get the blood of that girl.
This is not the end... Thales will carry out our mission, somehow...
You are but a savage, insignificant beast.
The cursed Fell Star... The one I fear...
I shall be the judge of whether you, too, are perhaps more than a lowly beast.
Have it your way.
Foolish.
The time has come.
